comment: His class is hybrid but I highly suggest you take his class. He expects you to write 3 essays and peer review during the semester but he is not a heavy grader. All he wants out of you is attendance in the class and you will do completely fine so I'd suggest you take him.

He is a wonderful teacher and very easy to talk to if you have problems or need an extension for work if you have issues that call for it. He is a very nice man and I can tell he wants to see his students succeed.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Group projects

comment: Professor Harold was such an amazing teacher. With covid, the class was online and he made all the weekly discussion questions fun. One week we had to take a Harry Potter quiz to see what house we were in and why it made since. There are 3 major essays which count 20% each. He gives plenty of time to write and research.
As long as you do what he tells you to, you'll get an A in the class. He also explicitly stated that the only way you can fail is by not turning in the work.

Take this teacher if you want to have fun in your English class. He's very interesting and there is not a lot of work involved. Just show up and do the work and you'll make a good grade. I had a good time in this class and I'm glad i chose this one compared to the other teachers my friends had.

Cancelled class a lot. Kind of unorganized but it helped because he graded easy. Somehow always got A's on my papers eventhough I didnt write that well. He accepts late assignments usually and is extremely flexible. RECOMMEND!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Amazing and makes this class not boring at all. He post maybe about 2 hours of work to do outside of class if that. He understands that none of us are really there to because we are English majors so he makes it interesting and fun too. Has a lot of pop quizzes so do all of the work outside of class to pass. Overall, really would recommend.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Master Phil is a very funny and unique teacher. He is honest and you get to talk about interesting things in his class. I recommend taking him for English. He's laid back and wants u to feel comfortable in his classroom. He makes u work for your grade, but if you show him effort he will reward u with the grade I want. He's also very easy to contact
This dude is great, just come to class. The class is really easy to pass as long as you come to class and do the discussion posts online.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Favorite English teacher by far. Fun topics and an even more fun class. He's there for you and is probably the best teacher at Kennesaw. I took him for all my English courses.

I had Professor Phillip last semester, and I regret not taking him again for English 1102. He is a great professor, and is a very friendly guy. His class is pretty laid back, and I truly hope for the best for Professor Phil. He was truly the highlight of my week.

Funny professor from the first day of school. Friendly and open to criticism. Likes to know his students and is very laid back. His grading system will make you laugh from the first day of school. His topics for essays became a bit controversial as the semester went on because he doesn't do traditional English classes. Just a thing to know.
Great teacher and is there for you. Essays are centered around current events instead of a book written over a century ago. Recommend taking this teacher for any class. Taking him for 1102 now.

Master PhiLL (as he likes to be called) is probably one of the coolest professors I have ever had. He is really laid back and understanding. He claims to be a tough grader at the beginning of the semester but I never saw that. If you have him for literature you can just kind of skim through the reading selection or google it and get an easy A.

This class is a prime example of what college should be like. The class overall is laid-back but still teaches you things. You discuss and write about many interesting and heated topics in there, as well as have fun discussions. I'd definitely recommend him for anyone and wish I could take him for 1102.
This guy is great and I'm highly disappointed i wasn't able to take him again for 1102. Take him, you won't regret it.
Very easy going, due dates are more like suggestions. Will cover controversial topics, but it is done in a controlled excepting environment.
